short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that overlays configurable watermarks on top of websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that overlays configurable watermarks on top of websites. You can make your own signature on what website you wannt to have watermark.
